description:
When launching a new instance with the option 'Boot from volume' the vm will be attached to all the networks available for the tenant.
I'm launching the instance through Horizon and using Quantum for the network.

I found a question related to this bug https://answers.launchpad.net/nova/+question/217379.
title: Boot from volume will attach the VM to all networks

comments.content:

comments.content:
The cause of this bug is already reported on #1004572 and is already fixed. The problem is that the networks are being ignore when the block mapping device is specified.

Something that is not clear to me is why all the interfaces are attached when there is none specified. Is it the supposed to be that way?

comments.content: OP realized this is a dupe
